程序包 cms.service.template.impl

类 TemplateServiceBean

java.lang.Object
cms.service.besa.DaoSupport<Layout>
cms.service.template.impl.TemplateServiceBean
所有已实现的接口:
DAO<Layout>, TemplateService
@Service @Transactional public class TemplateServiceBean extends DaoSupport<Layout> implements TemplateService
模板管理实现类
